channel.title: Tip on removing redundant do-while
channel.description: tbh, you should inline flow obstructors, and then have a class that goes through and checks for opaque conditional jumps and either removes them or replaces them with a normal jump; e.g. iconst_0 ifne does nothing, iconst_!0 ifne is a plain jump this'll remove both the redundant do-while AND zkm's flow obfuscation

item.title: Tip on removing redundant do-while
item.dc:creator: @Jython super_
item.description:
@Jython wrote:

tbh, you should inline flow obstructors, and then have a class that goes through and checks for opaque conditional jumps and either removes them or replaces them with a normal jump; e.g. iconst_0 ifne does nothing, iconst_!0 ifne is a plain jump
this’ll remove both the redundant do-while AND zkm’s flow obfuscation

Read full topic
